name: Synthetine Modern Chair
short_description: Ergonomic molded plastic chair with metal legs, perfect for modern dining spaces and cafes.
description: The Synthetine chair combines sleek design with ergonomic comfort. Its molded plastic seat and sturdy metal legs create a minimalist aesthetic that complements any modern interior. The chair features a slightly curved backrest that provides excellent lumbar support for extended sitting periods.

reviews.comment: Absolutely love this chair! It's so comfortable and stylish. Perfect for my home office.
Great quality, sturdy construction but a bit pricey. Worth it for the design though.
Easy to assemble and looks fantastic in my kitchen. Very comfortable too!

name: AeroFlex Ergonomic Office Chair
short_description: Premium mesh office chair with lumbar support, adjustable features, and breathable design for all-day comfort.
description: The AeroFlex Ergonomic Office Chair is engineered for maximum comfort during long work hours. Its breathable mesh backrest conforms to your spine while allowing air circulation to keep you cool. The chair features a synchronized tilt mechanism, adjustable armrests, seat height, and headrest to accommodate your unique body proportions. The premium materials and construction ensure both durability and style for your workspace.

name: SleepHaven Memory Foam Mattress
short_description: Premium 10-inch memory foam mattress with cooling gel technology and optimal support for quality sleep.
description: The SleepHaven Memory Foam Mattress combines comfort and technology for your best sleep ever. The top layer features cooling gel-infused memory foam that contours to your body while regulating temperature. The middle transition layer provides pressure relief for shoulders and hips, while the high-density base layer ensures proper spinal alignment and mattress longevity. The breathable, hypoallergenic cover can be removed for easy cleaning.

general_details.sales_package: 1 mattress, removable cover, warranty card, care instructions
general_details.features: Cooling gel technology, pressure relief, motion isolation, removable cover

warranty.warranty_covered: Material defects, sagging greater than 2.5cm, manufacturing flaws
warranty.warranty_not_covered: Normal wear and tear, improper use, damage due to inadequate support, comfort preference

reviews.comment: This mattress changed my life! I used to wake up with back pain every day, but now I sleep through the night and wake up refreshed.
Perfect balance of soft and supportive. The cooling technology really works - I don't overheat anymore.
Excellent quality and comfort. Takes about a week to get used to if you're coming from a spring mattress, but now I love it.

additional_info.care_instructions: Spot clean with mild detergent and water. Removable cover is machine washable (gentle cycle, cold). Rotate mattress 180° every 3-6 months. Use with a proper foundation or platform bed.

additional_info.unboxing_instructions: Unbox in the room where you'll use it. Remove packaging carefully with included cutter tool. Allow 24-48 hours for full expansion. Some odor may be present initially but will dissipate within a few days.

name: SleepCloud Memory Foam Mattress
short_description: Premium memory foam mattress with cooling gel technology and 7-zone support system for the ultimate sleep experience.
description: The SleepCloud Memory Foam Mattress represents the perfect balance of support and comfort for restorative sleep. Featuring five specialized layers including cooling gel-infused memory foam, responsive transition foam, and a 7-zone support core, this mattress adapts to your body's contours while maintaining proper spinal alignment. The breathable bamboo-derived cover wicks away moisture and enhances airflow for temperature regulation throughout the night.

Worth every rupiah. My husband gets up in the night and I don't feel a thing - amazing motion isolation!
Great mattress but took about 2 weeks to fully break in. Now it's perfect - supportive but still soft. Sleep quality has improved dramatically.

name: Zenith Recliner Armchair
short_description: Luxurious electric recliner with genuine leather upholstery, adjustable headrest, and built-in USB charging ports.
description: The Zenith Recliner redefines relaxation with its smooth electric reclining mechanism and premium genuine leather upholstery. At the touch of a button, transition from upright to fully reclined positions with independent footrest and backrest adjustments. The chair features an adjustable headrest, plush padding with high-resilience foam, and convenient USB charging ports to keep your devices powered while you unwind. The sturdy wooden frame and reinforced mechanisms ensure years of reliable use and comfort.

general_details.sales_package: 1 recliner chair, power adapter, user manual, Allen key
general_details.backup_operation: Manual override in case of power failure

warranty.warranty_covered: Frame integrity, electrical components, reclining mechanism, and upholstery seams
warranty.warranty_not_covered: Normal wear and tear, damage from improper use, power surges
warranty.domestic_warranty: 5 years on frame and mechanism, 3 years on electrical components, 2 years on upholstery
warranty.claim_process: Contact customer service with model and serial number at warranty@comforttech.com

reviews.comment: This recliner has transformed my evenings. The leather is supple, the reclining mechanism is whisper quiet, and the USB ports are perfect for charging my phone while watching movies.
Extremely comfortable and well-made. The headrest adjustment is perfect for my height. Took off one star because the leather creaks slightly when new, but it's getting better with use.
Worth every rupiah! The quality of this chair is exceptional, and the electric recline is smooth. My back pain has significantly improved since I started using it.

additional_info.care_instructions: Clean leather with specialized leather cleaner every 3-6 months. Condition twice yearly with leather conditioner. Keep away from direct sunlight. Dust regularly with microfiber cloth.

additional_info.assembly_instructions: Attach backrest to base using the slide-and-lock mechanism, connect power cord
additional_info.assembly_service_option: Professional assembly and positioning service available at an additional cost of Rp 400,000

additional_info.return_policy: 30-day return policy. Item must be in original condition. Return shipping arranged at no cost for defective items.
additional_info.exchange_policy: Free exchanges within 30 days of purchase

additional_info.shipping_info: Free white-glove delivery and setup. Standard delivery within 7-14 business days. Schedule precise delivery time at checkout.
additional_info.shipping_restrictions: Remote areas may require additional 3-5 days for delivery

additional_info.customer_service: For any inquiries, please contact our customer service at support@comforttech.com or call our hotline at +62-21-5550-7890 (Mon-Sat, 9AM-8PM)

specifications.recommended_use: Living rooms, home theaters, reading nooks

sustainability.recyclable_components: Electronic components comply with e-waste recycling standards
sustainability.sustainable_manufacturing: Leather sourced from responsible tanneries with environmental certifications
sustainability.packaging: Minimal plastic, recycled cardboard, and biodegradable foam inserts

seo.meta_title: Zenith Electric Leather Recliner - USB Charging Ports | ComfortTech
seo.meta_description: Experience ultimate relaxation with the Zenith Electric Recliner featuring genuine leather, adjustable headrest, USB charging ports and whisper-quiet electric operation.

name: Oakwood Living Room Sofa
short_description: Premium 3-seater sofa with solid oak frame and high-density foam cushions, ideal for modern living spaces.
description: The Oakwood Living Room Sofa blends timeless design with exceptional comfort. Featuring a solid oak frame with mortise and tenon joints, this 3-seater sofa provides durability that will last for years. The high-density foam cushions are wrapped in premium fabric that's both stain-resistant and incredibly soft to the touch. Wide armrests and a slightly reclined back angle create the perfect lounging experience.

product_details.finish_type: Natural wood finish with protective coating

warranty.warranty_covered: Frame integrity, foam density, springs, and structural components
warranty.warranty_not_covered: Fabric wear, improper assembly, misuse, or modifications to the product
warranty.claim_process: Email photos of the defect and proof of purchase to claims@furnilux.com

reviews.comment: This sofa exceeded my expectations! The oak frame is incredibly sturdy, and the cushions are the perfect balance of firm support and plush comfort.
Beautiful sofa that transformed our living room. One star off because assembly took longer than stated, but the result is worth it.
Luxurious fabric that's also surprisingly resistant to stains - our toddler already put it to the test! The charcoal gray is a perfect neutral.

additional_info.care_instructions: Vacuum regularly with upholstery attachment. Spot clean with mild soap and water. Professional cleaning recommended annually. Cushion covers are machine washable on gentle cycle.

additional_info.assembly_instructions: Comprehensive assembly manual included. QR code links to step-by-step video guide.
additional_info.assembly_service_option: Professional assembly service available at an additional cost of Rp 350,000

additional_info.return_policy: 45-day satisfaction guarantee. Full refund if returned in original condition. We cover return shipping for manufacturing defects.
additional_info.exchange_policy: Free exchanges within 45 days of purchase

additional_info.shipping_info: Free white-glove delivery nationwide. Delivery within 5-7 business days. Premium shipping insurance included.
additional_info.shipping_restrictions: Remote islands may require additional 3-5 days for delivery

additional_info.customer_service: For any inquiries, please contact our premium support team at premium@furnilux.com or call our dedicated line at +62-21-5550-8888 (7 days a week, 8AM-8PM)
additional_info.live_chat: Available 24/7 with priority support for premium products

sustainability.sustainable_manufacturing: Made using responsibly harvested wood from managed forests
sustainability.packaging: Minimal plastic packaging, recyclable cardboard, and biodegradable protective wraps

seo.meta_description: Elevate your living room with the Oakwood Premium Sofa featuring solid oak construction, high-density foam cushions, and stain-resistant fabric upholstery.

name: Luminari Table Lamp
short_description: Modern ceramic table lamp with brass accents and natural linen shade, perfect for bedside tables and reading nooks.
description: The Luminari Table Lamp combines artisanal ceramic craftsmanship with contemporary design. The base features a hand-glazed ceramic body with subtle texture variations that make each piece unique. Brass accents at the neck and base add a touch of sophistication, while the natural linen drum shade diffuses light beautifully for a warm, inviting glow. Ideal for bedside tables, office desks, or living room side tables.

general_details.sales_package: 1 lamp base, 1 shade, bulb not included

warranty.warranty_covered: Electrical components, ceramic base defects, and structural integrity
warranty.warranty_not_covered: Bulbs, shade discoloration from use, damage from improper use or voltage issues
warranty.claim_process: Email photos of the defect and proof of purchase to support@lumicraft.com

reviews.comment: This lamp is even more beautiful in person! The ceramic has subtle variations that give it character, and the light it casts is perfect for reading.
High-quality construction and elegant design. I only wish it came with a dimmer switch, but otherwise perfect.
The sage green color is subtle and gorgeous! It looks much more expensive than it is and completes my bedroom perfectly.

additional_info.care_instructions: Dust with a soft, dry cloth. Clean ceramic base with damp cloth and mild soap if needed. Do not use abrasive cleaners. Keep away from moisture and water sources.

additional_info.assembly_instructions: Simply attach the shade to the lamp base and insert bulb.

additional_info.shipping_info: Free shipping nationwide. Delivery within 2-4 business days. Special packaging ensures safe transit.

name: Botanica Indoor Planter Stand
short_description: Mid-century inspired bamboo plant stand with adjustable height tiers for displaying multiple indoor plants.
description: The Botanica Indoor Planter Stand brings natural elements into your home décor with sustainable bamboo construction. This versatile plant display features three adjustable tiers that can be arranged at different heights to showcase your favorite plants. The unique hexagonal design allows for flexible positioning in corners or as a room divider. Each tier includes a water-resistant tray to protect floors from spills during watering.

product_details.adjustable_components: Yes, tier heights can be adjusted

general_details.sales_package: 3 bamboo tiers, 3 water-resistant trays, assembly hardware, instructions
general_details.surface_finish: Smooth sanded bamboo with eco-friendly sealant

warranty.warranty_covered: Structural integrity, bamboo splits, and tray defects
warranty.warranty_not_covered: Water damage from improper use, normal wear and tear, or modifications to the product
warranty.claim_process: Email photos of the defect and proof of purchase to claims@greenspace.com

reviews.comment: Absolutely perfect for my growing plant collection! The bamboo is beautiful quality and the adjustable tiers let me customize it for plants of different heights.
Sturdy, well-made, and surprisingly easy to assemble. The water trays are a thoughtful addition that protect my hardwood floors.
Beautiful design that fits perfectly in my apartment corner. Only giving 4 stars because one of the trays arrived slightly warped, but customer service quickly sent a replacement.

additional_info.care_instructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Periodically apply bamboo oil to maintain finish. Avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight. Empty and clean trays regularly.

additional_info.assembly_instructions: Detailed assembly manual with illustrations. QR code links to video tutorial.

title: Going all-in with millennial design
author: Admin
excerpt: Discover how millennial aesthetics are reshaping wooden furniture design and creating sustainable style.
content: Millennial design is all about combining sustainability with style. This article explores how woodwork is being reimagined with clean lines, eco-conscious sourcing, and minimalist beauty. From choosing the right stain to highlighting natural textures, we'll guide you through the top trends. Learn how to bring warmth and functionality to your living spaces using wood as the foundational material. Whether you're a seasoned DIYer or just starting out, this guide provides actionable tips for a stylish transformation.

title: Why minimalist interiors are timeless
author: Jane Doe
excerpt: Explore the power of simplicity in home design and why less truly is more.
content: Minimalist interiors prioritize space, light, and intention. In this blog, we delve into how to create clean and calming rooms by reducing clutter and focusing on essentials. Discover how neutral tones, natural textures, and functional furniture can bring peace and elegance to your environment. From Scandinavian influence to Japanese Zen, minimalism continues to inspire timeless design.

title: Eco-friendly materials for modern homes
author: Green Living
excerpt: Make your home green and gorgeous with these sustainable materials.
content: Sustainability is the heart of modern home design. This post walks you through environmentally friendly materials such as reclaimed wood, bamboo, recycled glass, and low-VOC paints. Learn how to use these materials creatively to build beautiful, safe, and eco-conscious spaces. Plus, get expert tips on sourcing and maintaining sustainable furnishings that last.

title: Decorating with natural textures
author: Style Editor
excerpt: Bring nature indoors with organic finishes and earthy tones.
content: From rattan chairs to wool throws, natural textures create warmth and character. This article explores how to layer textures like linen, jute, terracotta, and wood for a cozy and stylish effect. You'll also find ideas for pairing textures with seasonal color palettes and tips for blending rustic charm with modern elegance.

title: Color psychology in interior design
author: Admin
excerpt: Understand how color influences mood and design choices.
content: Colors can energize, calm, or inspire depending on how they're used. This blog breaks down the emotional impact of common colors and offers guidance on choosing the right hues for each room. Learn how to mix and match shades for balance, create focal points with bold tones, and use accent pieces to subtly influence ambiance.

title: Designing small spaces with impact
author: Tiny Living
excerpt: Make the most of limited space with these expert layout tips.
content: Living small doesn’t mean living without style. Discover strategies to maximize functionality without sacrificing design. This includes choosing multi-purpose furniture, vertical storage, and the right lighting to make any room feel more spacious. With thoughtful design, small spaces can be both beautiful and efficient.

title: Crafting gifts that matter
author: Crafted Life
excerpt: Skip store-bought and create personalized gifts that make a lasting impression.
content: Handcrafted gifts show more thought and care. From DIY journals to custom wood plaques, we explore beautiful gift ideas that anyone can make. Learn which tools to use, how to personalize effectively, and where to find inspiration for your next creation. You'll also discover how meaningful gifts can strengthen relationships and spark joy.

title: Mixing old and new: Vintage modern style
author: Editor
excerpt: Blend nostalgia with modern touches for a unique and warm space.
content: Combining vintage elements with contemporary design is a creative way to make a space your own. This article shows how to incorporate heirlooms, thrift finds, and retro textures into a modern interior. Learn the balance between charm and clutter, and how to create continuity with color and form.

title: Budget-friendly furniture upgrades
author: Home Hacks
excerpt: Transform your furniture with easy and affordable tricks.
content: Give old furniture a new life without breaking the bank. This blog includes ideas like painting, changing hardware, reupholstering, and using contact paper to refresh tables, chairs, and cabinets. Get step-by-step tutorials and material lists to start your own transformation today.

title: Creating harmony with open-plan living
author: Design Daily
excerpt: Make open layouts functional and inviting with these expert strategies.
content: Open-plan homes promote connection and flow, but they also require smart zoning and decor balance. Learn how to define spaces using rugs, furniture placement, and lighting without sacrificing openness. Discover practical ways to maintain privacy, reduce noise, and enhance comfort in shared living areas.
